grounds-proposed-use.temporary-details: Temporary use as restaurant for summer season only (May to September) for a maximum period of 2 years. Operating hours limited to 11:00-22:00 daily. Full restoration to previous use at end of temporary period.
grounds-proposed-use.reason: Temporary change of use from retail (A1) to restaurant (A3) is considered lawful under permitted development rights for temporary uses up to 28 days per calendar year, with this application seeking confirmation for extended temporary period.
